hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Abdullah bin 'Amr that:He came to the Prophet [SAW] wearing two garments dyed with safflower. The Prophet [SAW] got angry and said: "Go and take them off." He said: "Where should I throw them, O Messenger of Allah?" He said: "In the fire

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ النَّهْىِ عَنْ لُبْسِ الْمُعَصْفَرِ،
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning the Prohibition of Wearing Garments Dyed With Safflower
